item.description:
We've had a lot of new members join this year. Whether you are new to Boston, new to our group, or haven't been to an event recently - we hope you can join us. Let's enjoy  dimsum, good company & conversation. After dimsum, we'll go and see the movie Skyfall. The movie has been described as one of the best Bond film in recent years. Movie is optional.

 Parking is expensive in Boston, we recommend taking the MBTA to Chinatown. And as always if your plans change please update your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the waiting area and will provide contact tele # also.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum & Skyfall Movie
